f_name = (
    'srm://lta-head.lofar.psnc.pl:8443/lofar/ops/projects/lc6_016/527613/L527613_SB228_uv.dppp.MS_90bafee7.tar'
    )
sl = srmlist(link=f_name)
http_link = sl.http_replace(sl[0])
self.assertTrue('https:' in http_link)
f_name = (
    'srm://lofar-srm.fz-juelich.de:8443/pnfs/fz-juelich.de/data/lofar/ops/projects/lc7_012/583127/L583127_SB010_uv.MS_c0a9adfa.tar'
    )
sl = srmlist(link=f_name)
http_link = sl.http_replace(sl[0])
self.assertTrue('https:' in http_link)
f_name = (
    'srm://srm.grid.sara.nl:8443/pnfs/grid.sara.nl/data/lofar/ops/projects/lc2_038/233700/L233700_SB290_uv.dppp.MS_83fc1cc3.tar'
    )
sl = srmlist(link=f_name)
http_link = sl.http_replace(sl[0])
self.assertTrue('https:' in http_link)
http_links = [i for i in sl.http_links()]
self.assertTrue(len(http_links) == 1)
self.assertTrue('https://' in http_links[0])
self.assertTrue(len(http_links[0]) == 186)
